meaningMnemonic: A <radical>gold</radical> <radical>Wolverine</radical> swam in the <radical>water</radical> while his father made a <kanji>record</kanji> of it. Wolverine is gold in color because he just won the gold medal in swimming, so now he is gold. Way to go, Wolverine.
readingMnemonic: Since Wolverine is actually a mutant, he is soon disqualified from his gold medal. His father makes a <kanji>record</kanji> of this also. One angry fan threw a <reading>rock</reading> (ろく) at Wolverine afterwards. Then another threw a rock. And another rock. Before you knew it, everyone was throwing rocks at Wolverine. Wolverine’s dad didn’t step in to help though, he just kept keeping records.
